user_story: As a Casual Reader, I want to see a list of all books I currently have borrowed, so that I can easily keep track of what I'm reading and their due dates.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have logged in with my library account
When I navigate to the 'My Books' section
Then I should see a list of all books currently borrowed under my account, including title, author, and due date for each.
And I should see a visual indicator for books due soon (e.g., within 3 days).

user_story: As a Student, I want to receive push notifications reminding me when my borrowed books are due, so that I can avoid overdue fines and return them on time.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have enabled push notifications for the app
And I have a book due in X days (e.g., 3 days)
When the reminder threshold is met
Then I should receive a push notification stating the book title and its upcoming due date.
And I should receive a separate notification if a book becomes overdue.

user_story: As an Avid Reader, I want to receive personalized book recommendations based on my borrowing history, so that I can discover new books and authors that align with my interests.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have a borrowing history linked to my library account
When I navigate to the 'Recommendations' section
Then I should see a list of recommended books with titles, authors, and a brief description.
And the recommendations should be relevant to genres or authors from my past borrowed books.
And I should be able to tap on a recommendation to view more details (e.g., availability in the library).

user_story: As a New User, I want to easily link my library card to the app, so that I can access my personal borrowing information and library services.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have downloaded the app for the first time
When I am prompted to link my library card
Then I should be able to enter my library card number and PIN/password.
And upon successful entry, my account details (e.g., borrowed books) should be displayed.
And if the details are incorrect, I should receive an error message.

user_story: As a Casual Reader, I want to renew my borrowed books directly through the app, so that I don't have to visit the library in person to extend my loan period.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am viewing my list of borrowed books
When I select a renewable book and tap 'Renew'
Then I should receive a confirmation that the book has been renewed with a new due date.
And if a book cannot be renewed (e.g., on hold for another patron), I should receive an appropriate message.

user_story: As a Parent, I want to manage multiple library cards within the app, so that I can track books for myself and my children from a single interface.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have linked my primary library card
When I navigate to the 'Account' settings
Then I should be able to add additional library card numbers and PINs.
And I should be able to switch between linked library accounts to view their respective borrowed books.
And each account's borrowed books should be displayed separately.

user_story: As a Student, I want to search the library's full catalog for books, so that I can quickly find specific titles or authors and check their availability.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the app's main screen
When I use the search bar to enter a book title or author
Then I should see a list of matching results from the library catalog.
And for each result, I should see its availability status (e.g., 'Available', 'Checked Out', 'On Hold') and its location within the library.
